maqras.text: 52|24|jinjucheoleom jal bogwandoen sonyeon-i geudeul juwileul dolmyeo sijungdeuldoda
52|25|geudeul-eun seologa seolo-ege da gaseomyeo anbuleul mul-eumae
52|26|sillo jeohuineun hyeonseeseo uli baegseongdeullo inhayeo dulyeowo haessnaidalago daedabdeul hanila
52|27|geuleona hananim-eun uliege eunhyeleul bepusa jag-yeolhaneun yeolpung-ui beollobuteo ulileul guhayeo jusyeossnola
52|28|sillo ulineun ijeon-e hananim kke guwonhayeoss-eumae geubun-eun eunhewa jabilo chungmanhasinila
52|29|geuleomeulo hungyehala geudaeneun junim-ui eunhyeleul bad-eun jalo jeomjang-ido animyeo michinjado anila
52|30|animyeon siin-iyeo sigan-i heu leum-e ttala geuege eotteon jaeang-i nae lil geos-ilago geudeul-i malhadeonyo
52|31|illeogalodoe neohuiga gidalila nado yeogsi neohuiwa hamkke gidalinola
52|32|geudeul-ui iseong-i igeos-eul jong-yonghandan mal-inyo animyeon geudeul-i saag han baegseongdeul-inyo
52|33|animyeon geuga geu mesejileul wijohayeossda geudeul-i malhaneunyo geuleoh ji anhnola geudeul-i mid-eum-eul geoyeoghal ppun-ila
52|34|geudeul-i sasil-ilamyeon geuwa gat eun malsseum-eul geudeullo hayeogeum ileuge hala
52|35|geudeul-eun seuseulo changjodoeeossneunyoanimyeon geudeul seuseuloga jomulju-ideonyo
52|36|animyeon geudeul-i haneulgwa daeji leul changjohayeossda hadeonyo geuleohji a nihani geudeul-egeneun hwaggohan mid-eum-i eobs-eul ppun-ila
52|37|junim-ui bomul-i geudeul-ege iss da hadeonyo animyeon geudeul-aege jeoldae jeog gwonneung-i issdago hadeonyo
52|38|animyeon geudeul-i haneul-e olla bimil-eul deul-eul sadalilado gajigo issneunyo geuleohdamyeon geu bimil-eul deul-eoss deon jalo hayeogeum myeongbaeghan jeung-geoleul ibjeunghala
52|39|neohuineun adeul-i issneunde hana nim-eun ttaldeulman issdaneun geos-inyo
52|40|geudaega geudeul-ege bosang-eul yoguhayeo geudeul-i buchaelo mugeoun jim eul jige doeeossdan mal-inyo
52|41|animyeon geudeul-ege boiji anh neun geos-i iss-eo geugeos-eul giloghago issneunyo
52|42|animyeon geudeul-i geudaee daeha yeo eummoleul kkumineunyo hananimkke do jeonhaneun ja seuseulo geu eummo-e ppajige doenola
52|43|animyeon geudeul-egeneun hananim anin daleun sin-i issda hadeonyo geudeul-i sungbaehaneun modeun geos wie gyesineunhananim-iyeo heullo yeong-gwang bad-eusoseo
52|44|geudeul-eun geudeul wie tteol-eojineun haneul-ui jogag-eul bogoseodo igeos-eun guleumdeong-eolilago geudeul-eun malhal geos-ila
52|45|geuleomeulo geudeul-i gongpolo sseu leojineun geunal-eul maj-ihal ttaekkaji geu deul-eul beolyeodula
52|46|geunal-i doemae geudeul-ui eummoneun geudeul-eul yuyongke haji moshago guwon do badji moshanola
52|47|sillo joeag-eul jeojileun jadeul-e geneun geugeos oeedo tto daleun beol-i iss-eul geos-ila geuleona geudeul daedasu neun alji moshadeola
52|48|geuleomeulo innaehamyeo geudae ju nim-ui simpan-eul gidalila sillo geudae neun hananim-i geudaeleul bohohago iss nola geuligo nega il-eoseol ttae geudaejunim-eul chanmihala
52|49|bamjung-edo geuligo byeoldeul-i jil ttaeedo hananim-eul chanmihala
53|1|jineun byeol-eul dugo maengsehasa
53|2|neohuiui donglyoneun banghwanghajidoanhgo yuhogdoejido ani haess-eumyeo
53|3|geuui yogmang-eul malhago issneun geosdo anila
53|4|geugeos-eun geuege naelyeojin gyesila
53|5|geuneun neunglyeog-i iss-eusin bun-eulobuteo baewossnola
53|6|geuneun jihyeleul gajigo natanass-euni
53|7|geuneun jipyeongseon gajang nop-eun gos-e iss-eossnola
53|8|geuleon hu geuneun gakkai dagawass euni
53|9|geu geolineun hwal yangjjog kkeut saiuigil-i heug-eun geuboda deo gakkawossdeola
53|10|geuleohge hayeo hananim-eun geuui jong-ege jeonhagoja han gyesileul naelyeoss eumae
53|11|geuui ma-eum-eun geuga bon geos-edaehayeo geojisham-i eobsdeola
53|12|geulaedo neohuineun geuga bon geoshe gwanhayeo nonjaenghago issneunyo
53|13|sillo geuneun dasi hanbeon geuleul boass-euni
53|14|majimag sideula namuyeop-e iss eossdeola
53|15|geugos gakkaieneun yeongjuhal cheon gug-i iss-euni
53|16|bola sideula namuga galiwo jimae
53|17|geuui siseon-eun heut-eojiji ani hago hangyeleul neomjido anhdeola
53|18|sillo geuneun gajang widaehan hananim-ui yejeungdeul-eul boassnola
53|19|sillo neohuineun lateuwa usjaleul boass-eumyeo
53|20|sebeonjjaeui usang manateuleul bo assneunyo
53|21|neohuiegeneun namjaga issgo ha nanim-egeneun yeojaga issdan mal-inyo
53|22|sillo igeos-eun gajang gongpyeongchi moshan bunbaela

53|23|sillo igeosdeul-eun neohuiwa neohui seonjodeul-i goanhaessdeon ileumdeul-e bulgwahamyeo hananim-eun geugeosdeul-ege amu leon neunglyeogdo buyeohaji ani haessnani geudeul-eun imi junim-eulobuteo bog-eum ui sosig-eul deul-eoss-eum-edo bulguhago eogcheuggwa jasindeul-ui jeosoghan yogmang-eul ttaleul ppun-ila
53|24|ingan-eun geuga wonhaneun geosman-eul gajilyeo haneunyo
53|25|geuleona manmul-ui jongmalgwa sijag eun hananim an-e issnola
